sn9.7:4.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ āyasmā nāgadatto kosalesu viharati aññatarasmiṃ vanasaṇḍe.
sn9.7:4.2: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā nāgadatto atikālena gāmaṃ pavisati, atidivā paṭikkamati.
sn9.7:4.3: Atha kho yā tasmiṃ vanasaṇḍe adhivatthā devatā āyasmato nāgadattassa anukampikā atthakāmā āyasmantaṃ nāgadattaṃ saṃvejetukāmā yenāyasmā nāgadatto tenupasaṅkami;
sn9.7:6.4: Antakassa vasaṃ upesī”ti.
sn9.7:7.1: Atha kho āyasmā nāgadatto tāya devatāya saṃvejito saṃvegamāpādīti.
